Warn a user in this server.

## Usage

```sh
/warn
```

## Options

|   Name   |           Description          | Required |
| :------: | :----------------------------: | :------: |
|  `user`  |        The user to warn.       |    Yes   |
| `reason` | Why you are warning this user. |    No    |
